pullrequest.title: Support generating point cloud data in DepthCamera

content.raw:
it has a complaint about source compatibility that looks like a false positive to me on closer inspection

Added symbol:

~~~
$ c++filt
_ZN8ignition9rendering2v215OgreDepthCamera18UpdateRenderTargetESt10shared_ptrINS1_17OgreRenderTextureEEPN4Ogre8MaterialERKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEEE
ignition::rendering::v2::OgreDepthCamera::UpdateRenderTarget(std::shared_ptr<ignition::rendering::v2::OgreRenderTexture>, Ogre::Material*, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&)
~~~

Removed symbol:

~~~
$ c++filt
_ZN8ignition9rendering2v215OgreDepthCamera18UpdateRenderTargetENSt10shared_ptrINS1_17OgreRenderTextureEEEPN4Ogre8MaterialERKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcEE 
ignition::rendering::v2::OgreDepthCamera::UpdateRenderTarget(std::shared_ptr<ignition::rendering::v2::OgreRenderTexture>, Ogre::Material*, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char> const&)
~~~

with the difference being:

~~~
std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > 
std::__cxx11::basic_string<char>
~~~

so I think it's probably fine
